Key Match Events: FULL-TIME! Belgium record a 2-0 win against Romania, leaving all four teams level on points in Group E.
Post-Match Reflections: Kevin De Bruyne doubles Belgium's lead to surely seal all three points.
Jeremy Doku does well on the left-hand side before finding Romelu Lukaku in the box who lays it off for Youri Tielemans to fire in from the edge of the box.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match stats indicate a well-controlled game with Belgium leading 1-0 at halftime and 2-0 at full-time.
Kevin De Bruyne was a key contributor to Belgium's victory.
Jeremy Doku and Romelu Lukaku played significant roles in the goal-scoring sequence.
